channel.title: lemmy_one on Lemmy Community Directory
channel.description: Recent content in lemmy_one on Lemmy Community Directory

item.title: Chat
item.description: /c/Chat on lemmy.one https://lemmy.one/c/chat Description A relaxed section for uncategorized discussion. Post a question, share some advice, let us know how your week is going, etc. Details * Subscribers 671 Posts 34 Comments 633 Daily Active Users 67 Weekly Active Users 238 Monthly Active Users 281 Published 2023-06-02 03:50:12 Updated 2023-06-02 03:57:21 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:54

item.title: exchristian
item.description: /c/exchristian on lemmy.one https://lemmy.one/c/exchristian Description Welcome to the exchristian community! We strive to provide a safe space for anyone looking to leave the religion or seek comfort while dealing with the fallout from leaving. This site was originally hosted on reddit before the Great Exodus of 2023. Details * Subscribers 124 Posts 13 Comments 45 Daily Active Users 6 Weekly Active Users 16 Monthly Active Users 30 Published 2023-06-07 02:30:12 Updated 2023-06-14 16:26:09 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:54

item.title: genderqueer
item.description: /c/genderqueer on lemmy.one https://lemmy.one/c/genderqueer Description Rules: - All standard rules for the lemmy.one instance apply - Do not attempt to label others without their permission or police the labels or microlabels they choose to identify with. - TERFS, NAZIS, or other hateful groups or behaviors will NOT be tolerated. - NO POLITICS! Please! In order to keep things civil; we will not be allowing political posts here. - NO SURVEYS! We are not your Zoo!

item.title: Jonah Aragon
item.description: /c/Jonah Aragon on lemmy.one https://lemmy.one/c/jonaharagon Description Lemmy.one admin [u/jonah](https://lemmy.one/u/jonah)'s community for testing things out and maybe posting random personal updates ü§∑\u200d‚ôÇÔ∏è Details * Subscribers 6 Posts 1 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 1 Monthly Active Users 1 Published 2023-06-07 03:29:06 Updated 2023-06-07 03:31:55 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:54

item.title: Meta (lemmy.one)
item.description: /c/Meta (lemmy.one) on lemmy.one https://lemmy.one/c/meta Description A place to discuss or ask anything about lemmy.one's instance or moderation. For discussion about Lemmy (the software) itself, visit [!lemmy@lemmy.ml](https://lemmy.one/c/lemmy@lemmy.ml) Details * Subscribers 267 Posts 24 Comments 162 Daily Active Users 22 Weekly Active Users 66 Monthly Active Users 111 Published 2023-06-01 00:50:49 Updated 2023-06-06 04:05:28 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:54

item.title: nonbinary
item.description: /c/nonbinary on lemmy.one https://lemmy.one/c/nonbinary Description **Welcome Rexxitors, to the new home of r/nonbinary and r/enby** This is a space for people of all ages who feel that they don't fit into our culture's gender binary. Share stories, experiences, questions, images, art, poetry - anything to help you through the journey of expressing the real you and meeting others who are like you. # Rules -**No gatekeeping.** The foundation of this sub is inclusivity.

item.title: Privacy Guides
item.description: /c/Privacy Guides on lemmy.one https://lemmy.one/c/privacyguides Description *In the digital age, protecting your personal information might seem like an impossible task. We‚Äôre here to help.* This is a community for sharing news about privacy, posting information about cool privacy tools and services, and getting advice about your privacy journey. --- You can subscribe to this community from any Kbin or Lemmy instance: - [Subscribe on Kbin.social](https://kbin.social/m/privacyguides@lemmy.one) - [Subscribe on Lemmy.one](https://lemmy.one/c/privacyguides) - [Subscribe on Lemmy.

item.title: scams
item.description: /c/scams on lemmy.one https://lemmy.one/c/scams Description /c/Scams on Lemmy.one is an anti-scam discussion and advice community oriented towards helping educate people about common scams. **Rules** 1. No personal information of any kind, including last names, addresses, and phone numbers. 2. No personal army requests. Details * Subscribers 54 Posts 2 Comments 4 Daily Active Users 3 Weekly Active Users 9 Monthly Active Users 9 Published 2023-06-10 17:54:12 Updated 2023-06-12 16:50:11 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:54
